text:
```ingest = Channel(10)
take!(ingest)```
no way to stop this in Jupyter without restarting (read:crashing) the kernel....

elements.text: no way to stop this in Jupyter without restarting (read:crashing) the kernel....

text: You should be able to just do an interrupt. But it’s just like the traditional shell in this way, it can only execute code serially. You can work around it with @async (and maybe a matching wait)
